test-case.description: Test boolean fn:string-join on various cases
test-case.test: declare function local:repeat($count as xs:integer, $arg as xs:string) as xs:string* { if ($count le 0) then "" else for $x in 1 to $count return $arg }; string-join( for $x in 0 to 4 return local:repeat($x, 'a') , ' ') and string-join( for $x in 0 to 4 return local:repeat($x, 'a') , '')
